bibl.title: Houses in Syene in the Patermouthis Archive.
bibl.note: 1. A list of the texts. - 2. Terminology. - 3. Description of houses; comparison with Aramaic documents from Syene. - 4. How houses are situated in the urban fabric of Syene. - 5. Prices of houses and shares of houses. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: HUSSON Geneviève, Houses in Syene in the Patermouthis Archive.

1. A list of the texts. - 2. Terminology. - 3. Description of houses; comparison with Aramaic documents from Syene. - 4. How houses are situated in the urban fabric of Syene. - 5. Prices of houses and shares of houses. - Conclusions.
